alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 2:08AM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 8 and 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph in the Flathead Valley by Wednesday evening. * WHERE...Flathead Valley, Polson, Flathead Lake, and Mission Valley. * WHEN...From 5 AM early this morning to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blizzard conditions are expected in the Flathead Valley by Wednesday evening, reducing visibility to less than one quarter mile at times. Drifting snow could cause roads to become impassable. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
